description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 5th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.tPozFv7Hy3bUfrDg]{Smite of the Flame Cage}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.FUwB2cNZ5Jz9TOp3]{Smite of Winter's Grip}
